title: Style Modal Components to Match App Design
description: Update OutcomeComments, PersonalizedComments, and ClassManagement components to match the overall app design system. Remove modal-specific UI elements (titles, close buttons) since these components are now embedded in tab panels rather than displayed as standalone modals.

complexity.reasoning: Pure styling changes to match existing design system with removal of unnecessary UI elements. Similar to completed tab-bar-styling feature. Changes are localized to 3 component files with minimal risk. No new functionality, API changes, or architectural modifications required. Estimated effort < 1 day.

factors.scope: Styling updates to 3 existing components (OutcomeCommentsModal, PersonalizedCommentsModal, ClassManagementModal)
factors.impact: Visual consistency improvements, removal of modal chrome (titles, close buttons)
factors.risk: Low - isolated changes, no behavior modifications
factors.dependencies: None - components already exist and are functional
